T02vchedppu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān /
T02vchedppu:5: anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
T02vchedppu:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya /
T02vchedppu:9: śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdad bhagavān /
T02vchedppu:10: prajñapta evāsane paryaṃkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
T02vchedppu:11: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkkraman upasaṃkkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavaṃtaṃ tṛḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtvā ekāṃte nyaṣīdan /
T02vchedppu:13: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ tasyām eva pariṣadi sannipatito
T02vchedppu:15: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:16: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisatvā mahāsatvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
T02vchedppu:17: yāvad eva tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parittāḥ paramayā parindanayā /
T02vchedppu:21: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:22: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte anuparigṛhītās tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa
T02vchedppu:24: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye /
T02vchedppu:28: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
T02vchedppu:31: iha subhūte bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitair evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
T02vchedppu:32: yāvaṃtaḥ satvāḥ satvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā upapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naiva saṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ yāvat satvadhātuḥ prajñapyamānaḥ prajñapyate te mayā sarve anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
T02vchedppu:33: evam aparimāṇāṃś ca satvān parinirvāpayitavyāḥ na ca kaścit satvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
T02vchedppu:35: sacet subhūte bodhisatvasya satvasaṃjñā pravartate na sa bodhisatva iti vaktavyaḥ /
T02vchedppu:37: na sa subhūte bodhisatvo vaktavyo yasya satvasaṃjñā pravarteta jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta /
T02vchedppu:39: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvena na vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
T02vchedppu:41: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu na dharmapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
T02vchedppu:42: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
T02vchedppu:45: yaḥ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ apratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
T02vchedppu:46: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇam udgrahītum /
T02vchedppu:56: evam etat subhūte yo bodhisatvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
T02vchedppu:57: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ bodhisatvena dānamayaṃ puṇyakṛyāvastuṃ dānaṃ dātavyam /
T02vchedppu:59: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathāgato lakṣaṇasaṃpadā draṣṭavyaḥ /
T02vchedppu:60: bhagavān āha na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
T02vchedppu:62: yā sā tathāgatena lakṣaṇasaṃpad bhāsitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
T02vchedppu:63: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:68: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:69: asti bhagavan kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:72: asti kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:73: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisatvā mahāsatvā paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne śīlavaṃto guṇavaṃtaḥ prajñāvaṃto bhaviṣyaṃti
T02vchedppu:74: / na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:76: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti anekabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:77: ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣv ekacittaprasādamātram api pratilapsyaṃte /
T02vchedppu:78: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena sarve te aprameyaṃ puṇyaskaṃdhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti pratigṛhīṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:80: na hi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
T02vchedppu:81: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate nādharmasaṃjñā nāpi teṣāṃ saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartsyate /
T02vchedppu:83: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet
T02vchedppu:85: / saced adharmasaṃjñā pravarteta sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet /
T02vchedppu:88: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmodgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
T02vchedppu:89: tasmād idaṃ sandhāya tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhiḥ dharmāḥ eva prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmāḥ /
T02vchedppu:91: punar aparaṃ bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:92: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kācit tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
T02vchedppu:93: kaścid vā dharmas tathāgatena deśitaḥ // subhūtir āha /
T02vchedppu:94: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
T02vchedppu:95: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatena deśitaḥ /
T02vchedppu:103: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya imāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
T02vchedppu:104: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt
T02vchedppu:107: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vchedppu:110: tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate puṇyaskandhaḥ askandha iti bhagavān āha /
T02vchedppu:111: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ tṛsāhasrāmahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt
T02vchedppu:112: / yaś ceto dharmaparyāyad aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo
T02vchedppu:113: deśayet saṃprakāśayed ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vchedppu:116: ato nirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T02vchedppu:119: buddhadharmāḥ buddhadhannā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāś caiva te /
T02vchedppu:122: api nu srotāpannasya evaṃ bhavati mayā srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:127: na hi sa bhagavan kiṃcid āpannaḥ /
T02vchedppu:129: na rūpam āpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān na dharmān āpannaḥ /
T02vchedppu:133: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāminaḥ evaṃ bhaven mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti
T02vchedppu:138: na sakṛdāgāmino evaṃ bhavati mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:140: na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvam āpannaḥ /
T02vchedppu:144: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:152: api nv arhato evaṃ bhavati mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:156: na hi bhagavan sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhan nāmaḥ /
T02vchedppu:157: saced bhagavann arhata evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:164: na ca me bhagavann evaṃ bhavati aham asmi arhann iti /
T02vchedppu:165: sacen mama bhagavann evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
T02vchedppu:174: kaścid dharmas tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ /
T02vchedppu:178: na sa kaścid dharmaḥ tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ
T02vchedppu:181: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisatvo evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti sa vitathaṃ vadet
T02vchedppu:183: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhā hy ete tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
T02vchedppu:186: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ apratiṣṭhitaṃ /
T02vchedppu:190: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavet /
T02vchedppu:191: yasyaivaṃrūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājā /
T02vchedppu:192: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet /
T02vchedppu:204: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāvaṃtyo gaṃgānadyāṃ vālukās tāvaṃtya eva gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ /
T02vchedppu:205: api nu tāsu bahvyo vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
T02vchedppu:207: tā eva tāvad bhagavan bahvyo gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ prāg eva yās tāsu vālukāḥ /
T02vchedppu:209: ārocayāmi te subhūte prativedayāmi te yāvaṃtyas tāsu gaṃgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
T02vchedppu:210: tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo
T02vchedppu:213: api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vchedppu:216: sā strī vā puruso vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vchedppu:218: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt
T02vchedppu:219: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
T02vchedppu:220: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
T02vchedppu:222: api tu khalu subhūte yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā sa pṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūto bhavet /
T02vchedppu:223: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya kaḥ punar vādaḥ subhūte ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:224: tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharaty anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ /
T02vchedppu:226: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:227: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02vchedppu:228: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:235: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kaścid dharmo tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
T02vchedppu:238: na sa kaścid bhagavaṃ dharmo yaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
T02vchedppu:240: yāvataḥ subhūte tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit tad bahu bhavet /
T02vchedppu:244: pṛthivīrajaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ arajaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
T02vchedppu:246: yā sā lokadhātur adhātuḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
T02vchedppu:250: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dvātṛṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T02vchedppu:254: yāni tāni bhagavan dvātṛṃśanmahāpuraṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāny alakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni tasmād ucyaṃte dvātṛṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānīti /
T02vchedppu:257: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
T02vchedppu:258: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyāc catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
T02vchedppu:259: ayaṃ tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
T02vchedppu:261: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ dharmapravegenāśrūṇi prāmuṃcat /
T02vchedppu:262: pravartayaṃ so 'śrūṇi parimārjya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:267: jñānam utpannaṃ na mayā jātv eva dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
T02vchedppu:269: āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:271: bhūtasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā bhūtasaṃjñeti
T02vchedppu:273: na mama bhagavann āścaryaṃ yad ahaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇam avakalpayāmy adhimucyāmi /
T02vchedppu:274: ye te bhagavann imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhīṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:277: api tu khalu punaḥ bhagavan na teṣām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
T02vchedppu:280: tat kasya hetoḥ yāsāv ātmasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā /
T02vchedppu:285: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
T02vchedppu:286: evam etat subhūte evam etat subhūte paramāścaryasamanvāgatās te satvā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:287: ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā nottrasiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:292: yāṃ ca tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate tām aparimāṇā buddhā bhagavaṃto bhāṣaṃte /
T02vchedppu:295: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yā tathāgatasya kṣāṃtipāramitā saivāpāramitā /
T02vchedppu:297: yadā me subhūte kaliṃgarājā aṃgapratyaṃgāny acchetsīn nāsīn me tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā satvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā na me kācit saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā babhūva /
T02vchedppu:299: sacet subhūte mama tasmin samaye ātmasamjñābhaviṣyat /
T02vchedppu:301: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani paṃca jātiśatāni yad ahaṃ kṣāṃtivādī riṣir abhū tadāpi me nātmasaṃjñā babhūva /
T02vchedppu:302: na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā /
T02vchedppu:303: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam /
T02vchedppu:311: / tasmād eva tathāgato bhāṣate rūpāpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
T02vchedppu:313: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvenaivaṃ dānaparityāgaḥ parityajyaḥ sarvasatvānām arthāya
T02vchedppu:315: ya eva te sarvasatvāḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ta evāsatvāḥ /
T02vchedppu:316: bhūtavādī subhūte tathāgataḥ satyavādī tathāvādī tathāgato na vitathāvādī tathāgato /
T02vchedppu:318: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā na tatra satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
T02vchedppu:320: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
T02vchedppu:321: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣo vibhātāyāṃ rātryāṃ sūrye 'bhyudgate nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet /
T02vchedppu:322: evaṃ bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastvapatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
T02vchedppu:324: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaṃti
T02vchedppu:328: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena buddhās te tathāgatena /
T02vchedppu:329: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:331: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā pūrvāhṇakālasamaye gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
T02vchedppu:335: na pratikṣiped ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vchedppu:344: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ agrayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ satvānām arthāya /
T02vchedppu:350: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena /
T02vchedppu:351: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:354: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmo hīnādhimuktikaiḥ śrotum /
T02vchedppu:355: nātmadṛṣṭikaiḥ na satvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na jīvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na pudgaladṛṣṭikaiḥ śakyaṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
T02vchedppu:357: api tu subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyati /
T02vchedppu:359: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pradakṣiṇīkaraṇīyaś ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati
T02vchedppu:362: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpāṃ sūtrāṃtān udgrahīsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:363: te paribhūtā bhaviṣyaṃti suparibhūtāś ca bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:364: // yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā pūrvajanmikāny aśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyaṃti /
T02vchedppu:367: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare
T02vchedppu:368: dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa parataraṃ caturaśītibuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇy abhūvan ye mayā ārādhitā ārādhayetvā na virādhitā /
T02vchedppu:369: yac ca mayā subhūte buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ ārāgitā ārāgayetvā na virāgitā yac ca carime kāle paścimikāyaṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyām imaṃ sūtrāṃtam udgrahīṣyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti vācayiṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāṃtikād eṣa pūrvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sāhasṛtamām api /
T02vchedppu:372: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api na kṣamate /
T02vchedppu:374: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣet /
T02vchedppu:375: yāvaṃtaḥ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇaṃti /
T02vchedppu:376: unmādaṃ te satvāḥ prāpnuyuḥ cittavikṣepaṃ vā gaccheyuḥ /
